name: Escape (itch) (kblo04)
description:
Stay on the beat in this Journey tribute game! Capture the energy cells to survive and beat the enemies until the music ends.

How to play:

Space - Capture the energy cells, only close cells are captured

A/D - Movement

Mouse - Aim, left button to shoot

Esc - Pause/Options

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Menu music : Escape - Journey

Gameplay music: Separate Ways (Worlds Apart) - Journey

This game was made by Journey fans to a Game Jam contest, there is no comercial use of this material. Enjoy!
